name: Donkey Kong Hockey
description:
Playable 3D simulation of this   classic handheld electronic game including views of the original packaging and instruction guide . A RetroFab simulation Version 0.9.5 (beta) Details Title Donkey Kong Hockey Model No. HK-303 Series Game & Watch (Micro Vs. System) Manufacturer Nintendo Release Date November 13, 1984 Chipset Sharp SM511 ( 32.768 kHz ) Description

A hockey game where Donkey Kong and Mario try to score goals against each other.

Gameplay

The hockey ball bounces from side to side. When it hits the wall, the referee or "crazy spots", it changes course. Mario and Donkey Kong can move around to protect their goal. The first player to reach 10 points wins the game.

Modes

Game A - Single player
Game B - Two player

Controls Controller 1 Up Up Arrow Down Down Arrow Left Left Arrow Right Right Arrow Hit Right Ctrl Controller 2 Up W Down S Left A Right D Hit Left Ctrl Mouse Rotate Drag Press Left-click Zoom Mousewheel Resources Audio David Haywood ( youtube.com ) Box Art Nintandbox ( nintandbox.net ) Instructions Torsten Lindh ( intheattic.co.uk ) Textures Lee Robson ( progettosnaps.net )
